subject: Nutrition
title: Biotin The Beauty Vitamin
description: A short lesson to help you apply Biotin The Beauty Vitamin.

hook.text: Biotin supplements promise thicker hair and stronger nails. Most people already get enough.

buildup.text: Biotin, or B7, helps enzymes break down fats, carbs, and proteins for energy production.

discovery.text: True biotin deficiency is extremely rareâ€”it's found in eggs, nuts, seeds, and most whole foods.

twist.text: The beauty supplement industry sells billions in biotin despite little evidence it helps non-deficient people.

climax.text: High-dose biotin can interfere with lab tests, causing false results for thyroid and heart screenings.

punchline.text: The beauty vitamin is mostly a marketing story.

quiz.question: What risk can high-dose biotin pose?
